version.author: VF
version.changelog: Fix wrong positions with adjacent folder items

version.author: VF
version.changelog: Time interval can now be set in seconds, frames or beats Add buttons to preserve overlapping & adjacent items UI improvements

version.author: VF
version.changelog: Add warning message if user starts the script with zero or one selected item Remove option to resize the window

version.author: VF
version.changelog: Drastically improved repositioning speed, up to 100 times faster!

version.author: Vincent Fliniaux (Infrabass)
version.changelog: Add a button in settings tab to automatically generate a script without GUI using the current values (useful to add in custom actions) Few other small improvements
